title: Feeding Together Only Makes Your Bond Stronger!

replies.body: What I always go by is: if your team is doing something stupid, go with them. It's better to be stupid together than you being smart alone
The stupidity is so beautiful.
Thank you

Eh

I'd say thats how you lose games tbh

on a non serious note, nice meme friend

Is that why you're gold and I'm diamond?
Kidding
It only works if you really make a commitment to it and it's not diving their nexus, you can only do so much solo
If you lose then the other team is overall more smart

Pulling rank eh? (I know you are joking, people don't be dry and downvote me to hell)

Haha because rank just defines how important you are and how much you know right?
Rank is actually useless :3

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=p799xJq9,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-27T11:17:59.123+0000)
>
> (I know you are joking
Tons of people might not though
That is their problem

>I'd say thats how you lose games tbh

Not really. The problem with this being a team game means that even if what your team doing is absolutely the wrong thing to do, trying to individually do the smart thing only makes things worse.

What's really problematic is when not only are you the only one on the team who knows what to do, but every one else is content to do whatever they feel like doing.
Haha yep that's when you need to tell them "okay I'll gift u guys a free skin if you all listen to me, lose or win", works 200% of the time

Depends on who you're playing with. There will always be that person who gives first blood, doesn't call mia, doesn't follow his laner, and let's his laner get 4 kills at dragon while he stays top who will say "omfg quit feeding my laner". When you decide not to go in he will say "omfg noob team won't cooperate". When you decide to go in he will say "wtf why would you fight them".
I haven't met that kind of person, maybe because it's me lol!
What if they all do a different wrong thing while I, the fed one, have to back with 20 hp? D:

Shh *pat pat 
Sometimes you have to let them die
I mean you pinged what else can you do ;)
Unless they're aced, then push with ur team

Like that time i decided it would be a dandy idea to split push for an obviously free turret because the rest of my team would rather camp mid than focus on attainable objectives, even though i pinged them..didn't get the tower because i was soloing with poor wave clear, and at the same time my team thought it would be a challejour idea to turret dive the now respawning enemy team, with them having below 50% hp, and the last thing i hear while backing to base is "Enemy triple kill!!"...lesson learned..never again am i doing that.so i just derped my way back with the group for the rest of the game. it lasted a good hour and we still managed to win after we just said "fk it, lets pick them off and gg over to their nexus."
That was beautiful
You have problems? you go tell{{champion:201}}
Braum is such a panda <3.

I have seen a Braum top manage to kill a Mordekaiser by himself. It was glorious. Thank god for that damage reducing shield. But then Mord appeared again with a Vayne ghost and Braum didn't have a good time. ._.
they look so scared :p

At least Lulu has an assist.
*Huehuehue..*

And then Lulu ults Yasuo when 5 dive him and then Yasuo ults and everyone on their team finishes the enemy team off. 

Seriously though, I know this image's pain.
lulu+yasuo=freelo
Its okay Yasuo, all you need is 2 items and you'll be "ahead" again
{{champion:45}} is jealous

Wow! the 0/10 yasuo landed a 2+ man ult, now he is fed despite being 2/10 and will do ridiculous amounts of damage.

I've seen it, it fucking hurts.
{{champion:54}}
a 0/10 yasuo is more useless then a 0/7 lulu

> [{quoted}](name=Summoner Grey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=p799xJq9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-26T15:08:26.932+0000)
>
> a 0/10 yasuo is more useless then a 0/7 lulu

lol i only went super negative as yasuo once XD maybe twice but poor lulu

I vote close to even. 
Yes Lulu has a ton of utility do make things happen but 1 Windwall can change games.
Tell that to {{champion:122}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:82}} , the current top bans.

What? Unless you're running the 4 of them plus another champion with absolutely no skillshots then the point still stands.. There's still a team behind those other 4, and that team may need their skillshots/ranged AAs.

yasuo is behind?

don't worry! go to jungle/lane,kill the monsters/buffs/minions,get your {{item:3031}}  and {{item:3072}} (bloodthirster is optional)and go beat the shit out of people!

I feel like this when me and my support. those who feed together; stay together...
{{item:3070}}

Yasuo x Lulu

I called it NAWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW

And then {{champion:157}} was one shotted by {{champion:45}} in the midst of the hugging, shortly after {{champion:45}}  grabbed {{champion:117}} and her hat and yelled ADVENTURE! soaring through the sky inside a gigantic hat or something.

I won't lie, i stopped taking games seriously. And by that i don't by any means , mean that i'll troll, feed intentionally, Be offensive And overall Negative.
If i see that the game goes wrong, either due to my fault, or by the fault of my team mates, i of course will do my best to prevent that.  But i will generally won't care if ill lose or win.

I'll just be stupid , will attempt to make half arsed puns , or goof around with the people that kinda failed. People nowadays take the game way too  competitive, even in modes where it never ment to. Sure we all want to win. But people forget to have fun in the process.

I find the least amount of fun I have is when I'm in Team Builder (my preferred mode of play) and either the enemy team or my own, feels the need to trash talk after getting lucky or having a composition that just so happens to completely negate anything we have and a monkey that got brain surgery while in a coma could still beat us by randomly pressing keys.

I understand that is the nature of some games. You try to adapt to salvage a situation but the champion mechanics are just too cheesy in a given situation and even if you live, you have to run to avoid feeding but give up towers, dragon, etc.

But these jerks spam /all chat every few seconds as if they are SOOOOOO much more mechanically-skilled and even if you mute them, they do that stupid movement jerk-stop, jerk-stop, jerk-stop that makes it look like they implying we're their female dogs by the way their character's hips hump the air.

That right there makes me want to grab their necks in real life, throw them to the ground and stomp on their throats until it results in their decapitation.

It's hard to have fun when there is no mutual respect.

I don't mind losing. I DO mind losing to egotistical freaks.
Saving this.
then yasuo got a penta hitting a random Q
Poor lulu.
This... makes me sad for some reason :|
